wikipedia_page.main: Lt. Col. Alexander Learmonth (1829 - 10 March 1887) was a British Army officer and a Conservative Party politician.

response: *Lt. Lord John Kennedy (1859–1895), who married Adelaide Mary Learmonth, daughter of Alexander Learmonth MP for Colchester. Left no issue.
* Alexander Learmonth (politician) (1829–1887), British Army officer and politician
